Posts.Content: Hi! Just wondering if you ended up doing 6 tchp. I am at that bind now if I should do 4 or 6.
Posts.Title: Stopping after 4 TCHP

Posts.Content: Yes so I have been begging my medical team to do a scan to see the progress of the chemo on the tumor and they refuse to, and it’s not because of insurance. They just are demanding that I do 6  chemos and then they’ll do any type of scan. I can already physically feel that the tumor has reduced drastically or even disappeared. I really don’t feel having 6 chemos will make a difference. Anyways, I have an appointment next week with an integrative MO to get his opinion. Thank you for your response.
Posts.Title: Stopping after 4 TCHP
